body: Why are virgins fighting in the comment section of a porn comic site....its a mystery

@agapeh I have two things to tell you. 1) Being nervous about a gift is not exclusive to virgins, nor women, nor when the other person is their romantic partner. 2) I don't mean this in a condescending way, but I assume you don't have much experience with women or people in general. The fact that you (and others) think that defloration is the only way to make a girl feel pain during penetration only reinforces that assumption. And once again, her face in p15 isn't even pain. That expression is SO common in hentai, especially in this genre with small girls and big dicks. This artist isn't even known for drawing virgin girls. Seriously, why are you guys trying to make this girl a virgin?

@aldyn that only reason i can think i know not only virgin woman can get nervous about what she give to her boyfriend every girl that so much love her boyfriend do the same but if you give more attention on page 15 u can see her face that 'maybe' she get hurts cause that face is when u shocked about something. (i know it from guy on comment but i can't found it now but yesterday is)
@kamitokaryusai Why are you commenting the same thing? Did you read my reply to you?
@aldyn the black hair girl's reaction shows clearly that she's never been with a guy before.
@agapeh So you think she's a virgin because she got nervous about what to give to her boyfriend... Just... I don't even know what to tell you.

And if why theres no defloration tag? Maybe cause in this doujin not mentioned that her first time and theres no blood but its fr her first time cause from the first page how her get nervous or confused to gift what for him. Maybe?.

Ntr is netoru and torare its mean other guys fuck 'his' girlfriend that can called ntr and if 'he/her' love someone and the person 'he/she' love is fucked by other guy/girl its can called ntr too if the person fuck 'he/she' lover in purpose to steal the lover from 'he/she'. Ntr is about stealing other woman/man by having sex with them if they in relationships its absolutely ntr but in some conditions likes i said its can called ntr too from 'he/she' side in this doujin u can called it ntr why? Cause the guy and the girl is only one step far from dating and both loving each other and they know it. So this doujin is absolute NTR. That what i thought am i right? idk.

@kamitokaryusai If by "reaction" you mean pain, then read below. If you mean surprise and confusion, then ask yourself how you would feel if you were a girl high on aphrodisiacs suddenly getting groped by a bunch of dudes you've never seen in an environment that you've never been to after being misled by your friend who told you it would just be a photoshoot. I honestly don't know why you guys are trying to retcon this dumb hentai and make her a virgin.

@Evidenox I never thought one day I'd have to explain this, but virginity isn't the only way that a girl can feel pain during sex. There are many ways, in fact, like shoving the whole thing inside her at once (exactly how the guy did it here), and even then I wouldn't consider p15 as her feeling pain. More like surprise, which is exactly what she expressed through words. And even if we pretend like she felt pain, that's not how tags work around here. Exhentai requires solid evidence that it's the girl's first time, either visually (blood) or verbally. A facial expression isn't nearly enough for the tag.
This aint netorare wth
Good friend, really.
The fuck is the NTR tag for? she wasn't in any relationship she just liked a guy... geez...

@Aldyn she's clearly enduring pain on pg 15 @alonerone Netoru has the Kanji for sleep and take so the connotation of the word is to take while the person is sleeping or to take while the other is unaware. Using that as an interpretation things that can also be taken are not necessarily limited to those in relationships it can also be unrealized relationships or destroying an existing relationship like a family member or childhood friend.
@aldyn the black hair girl's reaction shows clearly that she's never been with a guy before.
This is not ntr though
Well Itsumi Kotoha and Horiuchi Sora found love with each other!
This manga is so stupid that I don't even care at this point. Also, why would it have the defloration tag? Nothing indicates that this is her first time.
